name: Apostate (Talilo)
description:
Hello!

This project was a subject of my university thesis. It's first person shooter made in retro pixel art style. It was inspired by old games like Hexen.

Description:  Retro pixel art First Person Shooter featuring many weapons, enemies, pick ups, artefacts with fun effects, hidden room, jumping puzzle and boss fight. Look for magical keys to open doors blocking your way to a target your contractors told you to kill.

Have Fun! Cheers

Supported language: English.

Controls:

  • WASD – Movement
  • Left shift  - Sprint
  • L Mouse - Fire
  • Tab - Equipment
  • F - Interaction
